name: Thaw
description: The anomaly crisis has united friend and foe alike in the present, but it has always been a one way trip…until now… What happens with those who can move freely through time align with those who have destructive ambitions?
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Faction Missions in one phase, and Supply Missions in another phase.
-- Unique Federation, Augments and Section 31 Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Zero Hour Archer, Sarin, Grat, Silik, Temporal Agent crew or Enterprise crew will provide a bonus to Faction Missions and Supply Missions.
-- Every Faction or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Zero Hour Archer, Sarin, Grat, Silik, Temporal Agent crew or Enterprise crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: K'Vagh
featured_crew.flavor: K'Vagh oversaw the Klingon Augmentation program, but when this led to the spread of the virus, he kidnapped Phlox to stop the disease.

action.name: I Suggest You Stop Asking Questions

featured_crew.name: Sarin
featured_crew.flavor: Disillusioned with the Cabal’s activities, Sarin created her own resistance movement.

action.name: The Price Of Evolution Was Too High

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Sato
rewards.flavor: Comm Officer onboard the Enterprise, Hoshi Sato's experiences led her to create a universal linguacode.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: K'Vagh
rewards.flavor: K'Vagh oversaw the Klingon Augmentation program, but when this led to the spread of the virus, he kidnapped Phlox to stop the disease.

adventures.name: Remote Shutdown
adventures.description: Encode a remote shutdown into some of the components.

adventures.name: Temporal Decompression
adventures.description: Prepare treatments for potential temporal side effects.

adventures.name: In Frequency
adventures.description: Modify subspace relays to boost delta band emissions.

adventures.name: Temporal Trade
adventures.description: Provide the necessary items to the alliance - within reason.

rewards.name: Thaw
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Sarin
rewards.flavor: Disillusioned with the Cabal’s activities, Sarin created her own resistance movement.

action.name: The Price Of Evolution Was Too High

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

screens.text: "So much for the Federation and any commitment they supposedly have to galactic peace. A temporal conflict is brewing right under your noses. What are you all doing about groups like the Suliban as their Cabal moves to attack time itself?"

"There are plenty of others who have stepped up in the Federation's stead in order to set things right. An alliance of several factions, from throughout time, is forming to address the anomaly crisis. With the anomalies gone, much of the temporal threat will disappear as well."

"What makes your alliance so worthy of trust? It sounds no better than the Federation to me. Insisting that what they do is for everyone's benefit when in actuality, they only seek to improve their own situation."
"Perhaps you are quick to judge because those selfish principles are what have always driven you, Silik? Though, I am curious, Captain. Will you be able to see this situation for what it really is?"

"So much for the Federation and any commitment they supposedly have to galactic peace. A temporal conflict is brewing right under your noses. What are you all doing about groups like the Suliban as their Cabal moves to attack time itself?"

"There are plenty of others who have stepped up in the Federation's stead in order to set things right. An alliance of several factions, from throughout time, is forming to address the anomaly crisis. With the anomalies gone, much of the temporal threat will disappear as well."

"What makes your alliance so worthy of trust? It sounds no better than the Federation to me. Insisting that what they do is for everyone's benefit when in actuality, they only seek to improve their own situation."
"Perhaps you are quick to judge because those selfish principles are what have always driven you, Silik? Though, I am curious, Captain. Will you be able to see this situation for what it really is?"

"So much for the Federation and any commitment they supposedly have to galactic peace. A temporal conflict is brewing right under your noses. What are you all doing about groups like the Suliban as their Cabal moves to attack time itself?"

"There are plenty of others who have stepped up in the Federation's stead in order to set things right. An alliance of several factions, from throughout time, is forming to address the anomaly crisis. With the anomalies gone, much of the temporal threat will disappear as well."

"What makes your alliance so worthy of trust? It sounds no better than the Federation to me. Insisting that what they do is for everyone's benefit when in actuality, they only seek to improve their own situation."
"Perhaps you are quick to judge because those selfish principles are what have always driven you, Silik? Though, I am curious, Captain. Will you be able to see this situation for what it really is?"

"Thank you for your efforts, Captain. It is good to see some within the Federation are finally stepping up. Anyone wishing to meddle with time, regardless of their stated intentions, is in dire need of scrutiny."
"And I must ask, whose scrutiny should that be? Time travel offers a potential benefit to almost anyone? Who wouldn't want access to it?"

responses.text: "Tell me more about the alliance's activities."

screens.text: "And yet it is more dangerous than almost any weapon. That is why the alliance seeks to close the anomalies and return the temporally displaced to their own time. So many powerful entities from across time, gathered in one era, is s recipe for a space-time disaster."
"They are made up of some of the galaxy's brightest minds. They have been studying the anomalies and various forms of time travel in the hopes of resolving the crisis and sending the displaced home."
"The alliance is formed from several factions across space and time. Many individuals, from Iconian engineers to Quarren scholars, have banded together to solve the crisis."

"We cannot continue to wait for your Federation to falter in the face of this anomaly crisis. These are some of the brightest minds in the galaxy, banding together to solve a problem impacting all of us. They are working hard to solve the problem now and deserve to be heard."
"It would seem the alliance is worth looking into. Wouldn't you agree, Captain? Perhaps you could be of mutual benefit to one another. Though I'd suggest remaining on your guard as well."
